title: Birthday Parties
subtitle: Have an awesome, stress-free birthday party at HCG

classes.detail: Price dependent on number of guests
Price dependent on number of guests

body:
We have 2 slots on Sundays for you to run your party. Each parties duration is 2 hours.

Please note that we cannot host parties every Sunday, as we occasionally have other events running within the gymnasium.

## Costs

* $150.00 for up to 10 guests.
* $200.00 for up to 15 guests.
* Extra guests charged at $11 each, with a maximum of 22.
* $100.00 deposit required at time of booking.
* Full payment must be made either prior to, or on, the day of the party.
* Party numbers are to be confirmed the week prior to party date.

## What we provide

* 1 hour of awesome fun in our gym, including games, challenges, and circuit work, along with an additional 1 hour of time on our mezzanine to host your guests and hold your party celebrations.
* a minimum of 2 friendly, energetic, qualified coaches.
* Table cloths and balloons.
* Gym activities which have the option of being matched to a party theme.
* Full use of our kitchen. Facilities include: Microwave, Full Oven, Fridge, Freezer, Kettle.

## You provide

* Party food & drinks.
* Serving plates and dishes.
* Plates, cups, and napkins.

Our facility is open 30 minutes before your party start time for the birthday family to prepare. Guests are requested to arrive no earlier than the start time of the party.

To request a time, please email our [office](mailto:office@hcg.org.nz).
